summary: Personal portfolio website for Sheik Tonmoy Islam
architectural_notes: Header section requires dark background for contrast with white text
Navigation menu and name display must be readable across all device sizes

existing_features.title: Add a dark background color to the header section in HeaderNav.tsx to ensure proper contrast against white text
Ensure the name 'Sheik Tonmoy Islam' in the header is clearly visible and readable against the new dark background on all devices
Ensure all navigation menu items in the header are clearly visible and readable against the new dark background on all devices
Verify header displays perfectly and remains readable across all device sizes including mobile (320px+), tablet, and desktop viewports
